sentences.en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
sentences.cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

sentences.en: Billy tends to keep things to himself more and shut himself off.
sentences.cn: 比利往往更多地将事情藏在心里，把自己封闭起来。

sentences.en: Has somebody helped himself to some film star's diamonds?
sentences.cn: 有人偷了某个影星的钻石了吗?

sentences.en: He barred himself in.
sentences.cn: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.en: He discharged himself from hospital against the advice of doctors.
sentences.cn: 他不顾医生的劝告自行出院了。

sentences.en: He introduced himself.
sentences.cn: 他作了自我介绍。

sentences.en: He knew full well he'd be ashamed of himself later.
sentences.cn: 他很清楚地知道自己过后会无地自容。

sentences.en: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.cn: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.en: He sees himself going right to the top of the tree.
sentences.cn: 他预见自己在同行中将无人可及。

sentences.en: He stepped out of the shower and began towelling himself down.
sentences.cn: 他走出淋浴间，开始用毛巾把身子擦干。

sentences.en: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.cn: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

sentences.en: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

sentences.en: He was making a visible effort to control himself.
sentences.cn: 他明显是在努力控制自己的情绪。

sentences.en: I could see the young boy struggling to free himself.
sentences.cn: 我看到小男孩正在奋力挣脱。

sentences.en: I don't think he could do himself justice playing for England.
sentences.cn: 我认为他为英格兰队效力时不可能充分发挥自己的水平。

sentences.en: In Europe, Aga Khan III presented himself in a completely different light.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲，阿迦汗三世表现得完全是另一副样子。

sentences.en: Knox had taken it on himself to choose the wine.
sentences.cn: 诺克斯擅自作主，选了葡萄酒。

sentences.en: Peter ought to be ashamed of himself.
sentences.cn: 彼得应为自己感到羞耻。

sentences.en: Why couldn't he ever rid himself of those thoughts, those worries?
sentences.cn: 为什么他总是无法摆脱那些想法和担忧？

sentences.en: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police.
sentences.cn: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

sentences.en: 英文释义：He poured himself a whisky and sat down in the chair.
sentences.cn: 中文释义 他给自己倒了一杯威士忌，然后坐在椅子里。

trans.tran_cn: （反身代词）他自己，（用以加强语气）他亲自，他本人
trans.tran_en: used when the man or boy who performs an action is also affected by it
